attributes.action: I wish to have one day off school a week for students all around England.
attributes.background: Due to the mental health of the students at schools across England I belive to help stop stress levels rising in students U think it would help to have a day off every week to break the week up to stop stress levels rising and the rising of stress levels could also cause an effect learning.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's not clear if you want schools to be required to operate a four-day week, or if you want school children to be able to take a day off school each week, no matter what the weekly schedule of a school is.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
